title: Nike dotSwoosh will sell NFT shoes starting ‘under $50’
content:
What can a virtual object mean for business today? Nike is designing a more welcoming Web3 platform to find out.

An Airforce 1 sits on my screen, rendered in metal rather than leather, catching the light with its chrome finish. How much would I pay for this image of a shoe? And how much would I pay for this picture if it unlocked, say, a matching pair of metallic Airforce 1s in real life?

Read Full Story
